creator: sam.sharma@gat.com
text:
Hi

The apr-iconv-1.2.0/util/Makefile.in fine has a command line as shown below
where '-o $@' becomes multiply defined because LINK variable definition. The '-o
$@' need to be deleted from this Makefile.in file LINK command so that it can
compile on MAC OSX system where compilation fails.

$(LINK) -o $@ $(iconv_OBJECTS) $(iconv_LDADD) $(LIBS) $(APR_LIBS)

Thanks

SAM SHARMA
